comments:
Scenario:  A WCT developer changes the Target Platform to leverage WCT plugins 
for application development.  The developer also uses JVE for UI development 
of the application Eclipse Views.

Symptoms:

THE .LOG FILE:

Eric, as a work around, try to put the dll in the JRE's bin directory (The JRE
of the project)
We have a problem using the right .dll with changing the target IDE.
*** Bug 86864 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This is a temporary fix, but will hold on for a while,
See Bug 87708
